summary: Defines a configurable neural architecture for joint multi‑label intent detection and slot filling on text inputs. The module integrates dataset preparation, loss aggregation, model re‑configuration, inference with probability scoring, threshold optimization, and validation metrics, leveraging NeMo and PyTorch Lightning components.
business_intent: Enable conversational AI systems to accurately recognize multiple user intents and extract corresponding slot entities from a single utterance, improving the understanding and response capabilities of virtual assistants and chatbots.
